Variable Description/Question: The generated unique identifier specific to the JCOIN Data Commons for a given individual (client or staff).
The financial quarter and year of enrollment
The U.S. State abbreviation of the site where client (participant) was initially enrolled
A summary of the current status where client (participant) is in study
What is your birth date?
About how old are you? (top coded at 90)
What sex was originally listed on your birth certificate?
What is your gender identity?
Possible Values: ['Male', 'Female', 'Transgender man/trans man/female-to-male (FTM)', 'Transgender woman/trans woman/male-to-female (MTF)', 'Genderqueer/gender nonconforming/neither exclusively male nor female', 'Additional gender category (or other)', 'Not reported']
Notes: For gender/orientation/identity, use items O1-O2 if possible, otherwise use D4a-D4c.   [Must use one or the other.]  False if not 'Male' and not 'Transfgender' else True

Variable Description/Question: What is your gender identity?
Notes: For gender/orientation/identity, use items O1-O2 if possible, otherwise use D4a-D4c.   [Must use one or the other.]

Variable Description/Question: [White] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY
[Black or African American] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

Variable Title: Race: American Indian or Alaska Native
Variable Description/Question: [American Indian or Alaska Native] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

Variable Description/Question: [Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY
[Asian] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY
[Other] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

Variable Title: Race: American indian principal tribe or community specified
Variable Description/Question: [American indian principal tribe or community specified] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

Are you of Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish origin?
Sexual orientation:  Do you think of yourself as…
Possible Values: ['Straight or heterosexual', 'Lesbian or gay', 'Bisexual', 'Queer,pansexual, and/or questioning', 'Something else']

Variable Description/Question: Sexual orientation:  Do you think of yourself as…
Have you ever been pregnant?
Possible Values: ['Never been pregnant', 'Currently pregnant', 'Previously pregnant, had a child', 'Previously pregnant, did not have a child', 'Not applicable', "Don't know"]
Notes: Does this just apply to that past 90 days?  If not, then the participant should be able to check more than one response.

Variable Description/Question: What is your marital status?
Are you currently living as married with a romantic partner?
Possible Values: ['Yes, I am living as married with partner', 'No, I am not living as married with partner']

Variable Description/Question: What is the highest grade or level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received?
Possible Values: ['Did not complete high school', 'GED or equivalent', 'Regular high school diploma', 'Some college credit but less than 1 year of college credit', '1 or more years of college credit but no degree', "Associate's degree (e.g., AA or AS)", "Bachelor's degree (e.g.,  BA or BS)", 'Graduate degree (e.g., MSW, MA, MS, JD, MD, DSW, EdD, PhD)', 'Other (specify)']

Variable Title: Education:  Highest grade level (if less than GED or h.s. diploma)
Variable Description/Question: What is the highest grade completed?
What is the highest grade or level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received?
Interview conducted with participant during incarceration?
During the past xx/30 days, how many days have you been incarcerated?

Variable Title: Medication ever prescribed for opioid use disorder?
Variable Description/Question: Have you ever been prescribed and taken medication to treat opioid use disorder?  (Illicit use should be excluded.)

Variable Title: Buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual: Lifetime months
Variable Description/Question: Lifetime months (buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual [e.g., Suboxone film or tablet, generic films or tablets, or Subutex tablets])
Lifetime months (buprenorphine injection [Sublocade])
Lifetime months (buprenorphine weekly injection [Brixadi])
Lifetime months (buprenorphine monthly injection [Brixadi])
Lifetime months (buprenorphine 6-month implant [Probuphine])
Lifetime months (Naltrexone daily (oral))

Lifetime months (methadone daily)
